title: The Wonderful Journey has begun! Thank you, Radio Konton!
Quick stop in Detroit, grab the journal book, and off to Hiroshima!
Happy birthday, SU-METAL! We are very happy to be here!
Hello, Europe! We are sooo happy to be here!!
Our second country in Europe, new adventures await us!
Estonia and Finland, here we are! These will be the northernmost cities we will reach in our journey :)
Back to Czech Republic to visit Břeclav. Snowy days... but lots of friends!
After a pleasant train ride, we arrived in Budapest!
Bonjour, France! YuiPop loves the juicy tomatoes found in this city
